Package org.gbif.portal.struts

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurableServletUrlRenderer
    Custom struts URL renderer that takes a global configuration to turn on/off the addition of the servlet context to a URL.
    DrupalParamsInterceptor
    An Interceptor that detects the GBIF drupal multi-params format, and redirects them.
    DrupalSessionInterceptor
    An interceptor that puts the current user into the session if its not yet existing and a request principle is given.
    FreemarkerHttpResult  
    RedirectMessageInterceptor
    An Interceptor to preserve an actions ValidationAware messages across a redirect result.
    RequireAdminInterceptor
    An Interceptor that makes sure an admin user is currently logged in and returns a notAllowed otherwise.
    RequireLoginInterceptor
    An Interceptor that makes sure a user is currently logged in and returns a notLoggedIn otherwise.
    ValidationInterceptor
